name: Nathaniel Baldwin
notes_md: He was [fired from his BYU job](https://www.deseret.com/2008/4/14/20082063/new-plans-for-old-factory) probably due to his support for post-Manifesto polygamy, but I find no support that he was excommunicated. He was a technologist whose improvement on the headphones of the day brought financial success, which he channeled to support the nascent Mormon fundamentalist movement. However, he was only married to one woman.
